name: Path N Adrenal Gland
title: Pathologic N
notes:
**Note:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Aortic, NOS:
        Para-aortic
        Periaortic
    Pericaval, NOS:
       Paracaval
       Precaval     
       Retocaval
    Retroperitoneal, NOS
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Surgical resection of primary and pathologic assessment of regional nodes is done but involvement of regional nodes not stated
Surgical resection of primary and pathologic assessment of regional nodes is done but involvement of regional nodes not documented in patient record

Regional lymph nodes, NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1

Pathologic N is not defined for this site/histology
In situ (no Tis defined)

No pathologic evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Regional lymph node(s) cannot be assessed pathologically
No resection of the primary
Unknown if any pathologic assessment performed
